impact-statement: Evidence that certain proteins can be transported between Golgi via structures that resemble COPI vesicles suggests that these vesicles could also be involved in the transport of proteins from the cis to the trans face of the Golgi.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
